itunes:title: 7/27/21: Jan 6th Derangement, Privacy Wars, Frito-Lay Workers, Donziger Case, Trump grifting, 2024 Outlook, Fauci's Plan, Private Equity, and More!
itunes:author: Breaking Points
itunes:subtitle: Krystal and Saagar break down the derangement surrounding Jan 6th, big tech's assault on privacy, Frito-Lay abuses of workers, Chevron's extended war against Steven Donziger, another Trump grift, the chances Trump has in 2024, Dr. Fauci's master plan, private equity, and more!
